import React from "react"; import "./Section2.css"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import {programs} from'../../../data/Admin-mock-data' export default function Section2() { const navigate=useNavigate() const learnMore=(id)=>{ navigate("Home/courses",{state :{id}}) } return (

Our Programs

Choose the program that fits your career goals and timelines

{programs.map((program) => (

{program.name}

{program.description}

‚è≥ {program.duration}
üí≤ {program.fees.domestic} Domestic / {program.fees.international} International
üìÖ {program.startDate} - {program.endDate}
))}
); }
